game.name: The Lord of the Rings Online™
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Co-op, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: Join the world’s greatest fellowship of players in the award-winning online re-creation of J. R. R. Tolkien’s legendary Middle-earth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join the world’s greatest fellowship of players in the award-winning online re-creation of J. R. R. Tolkien’s legendary Middle-earth.
